scripts.kill-ports: sh -c "for p in 5178 5173 5174 5175; do P=\$(lsof -t -iTCP:$p -sTCP:LISTEN 2>/dev/null); if [ -n \"$P\" ]; then echo Killing $P on $p; kill $P; fi; done"
scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n server,client -c cyan,magenta "npm --prefix visualizer-react run dev:server" "npm --prefix visualizer-react run dev"
